actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to limit the fee a real estate broker may charge for preparing an information return in a noncommercial real estate transaction.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set a five dollar limit on any fee that a real estate broker may charge for the preparation of required information returns in connection with residential real estate transactions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to limit the fee a real estate broker may charge for preparing an information return in a noncommercial real estate transaction.
